import React,{useEffect} from "react"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import ArticleFormFields from "./ArticleFormFields" import { AuthContext } from '../context/AuthContext' import {useHttp} from "../hooks/http.hook" import {useMessage} from "../hooks/message.hook" function ArticleForm(){ const auth = useContext(AuthContext) const message = useMessage() function submitHandler(event){ event.preventDefault() } useEffect(()=>{ message(error) clearError() },[error,message,clearError]) return( <>
Update
) } export default ArticleForm
